reviews.text:
This park is an amazing option for those who are looking forward to spend a memorable day with their loved one. Known for representing 7 wonders of the world, lush green islands with plenty options for adventurous outdoor and water sports is a perfect destination for family, friends or couples. If you are looking for amazing food option, then don't forget to visit Yule Tea Lounge.

Do visit as this place has plethora of things to offer.

Have you seen the Colosseum in Calcutta?? The Roman Colosseum? Here in this place known as 'Eco Park' you find the replicas of all 7 wonders of the world. Visit this place during the winters or spring for enormous greenery, beautiful flowers, and different colours roses in full bloom. Try to avoid visiting around the Christmas or the new year's event because it becomes shockingly overcrowded, however, the park has its own charm even in a heavy crowd as it is the largest park built over an area of 500 acres of beauty. Different programs are held during the New years eve like water show, light show, Christmas jingles, etc. Best place for a full day family picnic with the availability of food, water, and loo facilities inside the park.

Planning for a holiday with family or friends? Eco park is the best option . With only Rs30, you can explore the world of imagination, creativity and beauty. It's like blue print of our  beautiful world. And an excellent example of human creation. Explore the 7 wonders of the world with additional ticket fee of Rs30. Enjoy the world class taste of coffee in its amazing cafeterias. Let's your soul and mind get drowned in the beauty of its peaceful parks. Let yourself get mesmerized with its architecture. Loose yourself in the cool breeze flowing over the beautiful and huge pond. Come and experience the world here.

A great amusement park. A great place for an outing amidst nature. The scenery is beautiful. Away from the humdrum of life it's a place which offers that rare tranquility that we often long for. The well laid out gardens and the planning of the place itself is a visual treat that adults can enjoy, while the rides , park and boating can indulge the kids. The place has some restaurants which offers food. It's also a good place to have a picnic as well. For photography enthusiasts it's a perfect place to get some beautiful shots.

Eco park is a good place for teenager.Its very clean and tidy take care by the management of the park. The park is very and almost 5 entry gate.In this park people can come with there family and friends and there love ones for picnic and enjoy their weekends  in the park .Eco Park has many activities such as cycling,booting,motor booting, paragliding and other things.Inside the there is an Artificial lake and an resort on an Artificial island which will give you an good experience . Eco park is very silent and very relaxing place in the city. People who stay within city also come and even tourist vist this place. This place has all the food facility, toilets, transport and medical.In Eco park there is an seven wonders park in which you can see the replica of the seven wonders of the whole world . Eco park is very beautiful place to visit and gives a human touch with nature.
Thank you

The serenity takes the traveller away from the hustle bustle of the busy city roads. The boating complex is a nice getaway as one can spend the entire evening below the sky, paddling away on the paddle boat. Good place for couples definitely. This is a large lake where you can take a paddle boat to ride. Winter is the best time but the mosquitoes will keep you disturbingly engaged. Lovers love this place for its privacy and quiet.

A nice lake and boating experience. Good for couples. 
All fish restaurant nearby is an additional bonus for food lovers.
Had some fabulous fish preparations at the fish restaurant, with some delicacies not tried before. Food was awesome, prices unbelievable.
The Nalban boating park used to be a great place for couples as there used to be not just paddle boats, rowing boats but also Shikara's which served as a Romantic Hideout for couples who can afford them otherwise there were plenty of trees for which only the entry fee to the park was sufficient.

It is a striking lake side spot with lush greenery and stunning views at its beck. the serene lake makes for a remarkable backdrop to sit back and revel in its wondrous beauty. There are some interesting activities too that you can enjoy like boating, picnicking, playing badminton and more.
It is one of the best place to visit in Kolkata at night.
Enjoy boating at the nalban boating complex, have a cute little picnic at the lakeside, complete with the straw mat and delicious picnic foods and play badminton.
Open timings 9:00 am to 5:00 pm

It's a very nice family friendly place. The Fish Fest held in the park was fantastic for fish lovers and foodies. Parking is an issue. But, a small 10 minutes walk to/from the park after parking is worth it.. Especially after the tasty fish dishes
Excellent place for couples. Quite a good atmosphere for your privacy and has a good scenery. Worth going to it for at least once.

Excellent island of knowledge and science. Great for children and families. Good information counter and first aid centre. Nice display on India and its contribution to science and technology. Very spacious and arrangements are good. Staff is very supportive and friendly, they help underaged and senior visitors with great care.
The movie on human evolution seems patchy and seems to be over-shortened.
Dark ride for evolution of seems wanting more in the era data flood and abundant online information.
Science activities and games are of very good variety. Sadly, quite a few games and displays don't work due to lack of maintenance.
Maritime museum is in poor state with poor lighting, smudgy enclosures and very limited display.
Food outlets are not of good quality, few are quite shabby.
Overall good experience, can be improved a lot!

It is Oasis for Kolkata. Though it has lost it's old glory, still it is one of the main attraction of Kolkata in very reasonable price. The garden is well maintained. The newly introduced 3D theater hall is fantastic. However, the old scientific models must be renovated. We also enjoyed the mirrors. They are wonderful.

Very nice place to take children and learn about science. 3D and 2D shows are very good. Evolution of human and Sphere of Earth are very nice. There are lots of things to do and explore. One can easily spend 4-5 hours here.

This is just an awesome place to visit if you are in Kolkata. With family and friends it is a place where you can spend hours of time together. With a beautiful view all around. It has 'Ropeway' to take a better look at this mesmerizing city. There is a maze inside where you can have fun finding your way out. All this and the science fun, aquarium and many more.

It’s a great place to go with your kids. They will get to learn so much from the things available there. Things are basic science and it will make them to take some interest in the subject. Everything is excellent about it. Make your children read about the process which is written there. Reading will help them understand how it works. There’s a show also which takes place for around 20 minutes . Area is huge and takes almost a day to explore it completely.So be ready for a day tour, keep food items and water . Go in the world of science.
Almost every kind of fast food is avaible. Midnight and Noon deals have special discount. Separate family sitting area. Play area for kids.
Delicious food. Must visit fast food chain of Bahawalpur. Their pizza is even good
If you love fast food and you are lahori... U may not like much... But this restaurant is much better than others in fast food
Service is a little bit slow. but taste is good. You can visit with your family and friends. A good palace for a meetup.

It's a fast food chain with variety of menu including pizzas, burgers and many more. Taste is an good. It's an economical restaurant. But staff have got problem with their attitude. Management needs to sort it out.
One of the best gulati kebab that I have ever had. This Afghani restaurant is a treasured collection to the envious list of awesome restaurant that Kolkata can boast of. Highly recommended.

I had tried chicken kebab, chicken biriyani n a mutton dish... Mutton preparations were not at all good..it's written lamb on the menu bt they provided goat that too with bones..the kebab was also disappointing....very few staffs to attain...the decorum was also not upto the mark...I hadn't't expected that by spending so much money I would get such a low grade food n atmosphere...cc1 has much better restaurants...massekah is really disappointing..:(
Lovely ambience(although compromised lately). Good food.
good food  had a great time
Situated in the heart of city.Awesome place to hangout with friends. Friends can sit together for long time . Burgers are awesome in taste. All food items are good in taste.
Love to come here, after my coaching classes. It is very nice place for sitting with friends
Well !!!! Who doesn’t know abt Mcdonald 😄❤️ and i think 90% foodies will prefer to take a quick hunger break here. I request those 10% to fill the gap sooner the better 🔥 🔥🔥

It is situated in the Atlantis mall Civil lines......Prayagraj...... 
You all are well aware of the fact that it is a place mostly crowded.... it promotes self service.... the menu is being displayed on the screen above counters.... very limited items are there in this mcD Allahabad...  but it will be freshly prepared and served hot.... drinking water is available for free but one have to ask for it..... its affordable...... one cannot have a cosy atmosphere or a silent atmosphere since its generally over crowded....

I recommend you to taste ice creams...

I would prefer KFC for burgers. But if u want something lite than you ho for it.
The place is always crowded. Try the mcflurry and allu ticki

One of the best Pizza Huts in the area. First folks in so the buffet wasn’t completely out yet. Though the food that was, was absolutely delicious & hot. Staff was friendly & on top of things. Restaurant was pretty clean & well organized.
SO so ummy...and I love supporting young readers -- thanks, Hut! ...did I mention how very yummy the pizza was? Seriously. Good pizza 🥰
Love their pizza! It's the best anywhere. The service at this one is amazing, too!
Food was good and so was the service. Waitress was great also!
Pizza hut has been always the best pizza and love the salads and sauces. Great services as well.

Fantastic Ambience...
No matter what ur actually looking for
But If u want to have some Drinks & finger food then this it the best choice & convenient place to set 
Honestly very satisfied with their Special Service
Another pub that is a must try for anybody who is a fan of soothing ambience over club and partying to enjoy drinking with friends and family.
It's in cc2 Rajarhat. It's cheap place to hang out and have a beer. Food quality is good
Good food at appropriate price. We tried Chicken in oyester sauce, honkong chicken, Garlic chicken. First one is little spicy but worth to have it.
Min bill is 1000 becz they didn't like us
good work for society,  god bless your foundation...
Ok
very good service

I always go there for their chocolate pastries..... best they have is choco fantasy.... enjoy it hot with scoop of vanilla ice-cream..... must try when you visit there.... other things are also good there.... like their sandwiches and coffes and other cold beverages........
I love this place... Visiting this since 2012... Yes.. best things do happen over a cup of coffee...  Lots of memories for lifetime...
A nice place if you want to spend time leisurely. ( without spending too much) Ps: We ordered only a tea and coffee so no comments about the food. Service was fine.

Awesome beverage as well as food of CCD. 
Well coordinated staff ...................
Nice place to enjoy coffee. Good Environment

Wanna grab some real Indian spicy food at reasonable charges? Mehak-E-Punjab is a one stop solution for such a craving! It has wide range of Indian dishes, and they even modify the dish according to your taste buds. And the service is really good. The people working here are just awesome! The ambience is peaceful and a perfect place to dine out with your family or hangout with your friends, or just spend a lazy Sunday evening at the bar.
Hurry make a visit to this mouthwatering place!!!

Good place good food. Located in one of the most accessible places in Newtown (axis mall). The ambience is not so good but menu is affordable. Good for a sudden plan post office hours. Usually pretty booking not required unless you are going with a huge group of people and you want to. There is a separate section in the restaurant where alcohol is served with food.
Food quality has improved over the years. A good place to hang out. Although, the ambience could be better. If you are a not a vegan, you can check out this place once.
If you love tasty food with proper ambience than there is no place better than Mehak A Punjab..
Great and affordable place for drinks they have seperate section for ladies and family

Very good atmosphere and not so overcrowded and very tasty, delicous food but the behaviour of the staffs are in question and and the service is also very slow. Loud music but excellent location. A palce to have a good food like dinner with family. Overall it is in the middle of the rating as few improvements needed.

Awesome place to hang out with both friends & family. The quality & the taste of food is awesome. Bar is also good bt place is small. 
Overall a nice experience. I would love to visit there again.

Worst experience so far in my visit to kolkata. First of all they do not listen to the order properly and then they argue with you on the wrong order that they serve. Worst staff and no one to manage the place.

Exceptional degradation in service. Being worse day by day. I have visited more thann15 times. Twice I found hair innthe food. I let it go and didn't complaint thinking that it may be a one time mistake. Next the waiter didn't listen to the food item ordered and served something else an tried to blame us on the same. And today when they made the same mistake again, more than 3 ppl are coming and disturbing continuously with bad manner and rude tone and blaming on pronunciation.  Then
We asked them to call their manager and they reused. Very unprofessional.
Really amazed by the cricket-themed restaurant, the food here is equally good. The service was top-notch and the use of gadgets instead of the normal menu was impressive. Would love to visit again.
Food and ambience very much below expectation. Should improve on both count. Hospitality was good. But what is the use of hospitality without good food?
Nice ambience and well connected. Good was ok. Nothing extraordinary though
Great food and amazing ambience. But take care of the prices since its a bit costly

Ok'ish. Ambience was a let down. Expected something but turned out to be an ordinary (like every other). The name and ambience dont have anything in common. Food was ordinary and the service too. The restaurant was cramped up with tables as if they wanted squeeze every inch. I wouldn't be visiting a Copper Chimney again as there is not much to enjoy here.

You want to elevate your taste buds with some yummy lip smacking food, then get in and order their kebabs and pot dum Biryani. Their kebabs are perfectly grilled and mildly spiced. The pot biryanis will slide and the taste will last longer. I could personally finish one whole serve. Well enough boasting, you might have to taste to catch my hype. There is valet parking. Prices are on the higher side but worth the fine dine ambience and superior quality food.

Excellent place for Chinese food lover, specially the dessert section. There is no booking facility, you just have to come and write your name. Door opens 7pm in the evening. They have 5 veg and 5 non veg starters. Main course is not that great. Dessert is amazing. I could see most of the crowd in that section.

If you want the best Chinese buffet in the town then haka is the best option hands down. It also doesn't burn a hole in your pocket. A non veg buffet dinner will cost you rupees 500, while a non veg buffet lunch will cost you rupees 455. the timings for buffet in the evening at 7:00 p.m. to 11 p.m. the food is extremely tasty and enjoyable. did you serve the starters at your table and then you have to get the main course yourself. I had a wonderful experience at Haka.

Good food, excellent service. Overall wonderful experience. The buffet is available in low cost with good food quality and yummy deserts. Best experience in birthdays  when they arrange for cakes, play the birthday song.  Lovely experience all together.

Pocket friendly and budget Chinese buffet in town! 😊 It's a regular hangout spot for buffet below 500 during weekdays!! 😋 If u r in budget, u can sometimes easily opt this place... To have a nice fulfilling Chinese buffet...

It's located on the top floor of Mani Square Mall, Saltlake. This is one of the pocket friendly buffet in Kolkata which serves you veg and non- veg course in just 432/- (560/- in holiday & weekends). In comparison with plenty amount of dishes and price the quality of food is good. Staff are well behaved and friendly. The ambience is pretty normal. Overall I'm happy with this place.

Go there only if you're very hungry to do justice to their serving size.
Food was quite good and service quick and responsive as well.
As usual with these kinds of meals, the number of items are innumerable.

Only issue is to find a parking spot, specially on the weekends. Might need to keep driving further down to find a vacant spot.

Otherwise, highly recommend.

It's a vegetarian restaurant. I am non-vegetarian but still recommend to try it once.

Place is good, neat, hygienic and not much crowded. Bang on the main road. I visited on weekends but still the place was empty and strength of serving staff is much more then the customers. The food is similar to any other rajdhani restaurant. Awesome food with lots of variety. The staff is professionally good.
A good place to hangout with friends or families or you want to go alone and have meal.
They provide heavy discount on Tuesday , so if anyone planning to have veg meal on Tuesday then you must go try it.

Excellent place. A must go for vegetarians and all those people (like me) who have this preconceived notion that vegetarians have limited options.The ambience is one of the best you can imagine. The food is fresh and in hospitality I believe they have created a benchmark.🙂

Nice ambience and variety of vegetarian dishes. If you are kinda carnivorous type then you might struggle to finish all dishes. Desserts are very good. I liked the way hand washing arrangement is provided, like a server will come at your table with a pot of water and would ask you for washing. I think no dedicated parking is available there so you have to park your vehicle nearby. Overall it is a good experience.

You can't miss the place. It's right on Park Street. After Park Hotel and Oxford. Good wholesome food. Only thalis (all you can eat) are available here. Price is around Rs 450 per person generally and Rs 250 on Tuesdays. It's a mix of Gujarati and Marwadi food. Go on an empty stomach as the food is quite filling. The service at this place is top notch. One of the best services you'll find in the city! For sure.

Bar food, but good bar food. Always have to double check we got everything, even when dining in someone inevitably doesn't get an item. I don't like their fries, but they are happy to sub onion rings so we we're very happy. Waitresses and bartenders are happy and you can tell they take their job seriously. If not for the price we would eat here more often, it's a treat.

Good wings, great burgers, and an amazing salad. 25 years ago we came just fir the beers and pretty servers. The servers are still cute, but the food has exceeded my expectations.
Rustic and informal, I would not take young kids, nor expect to score points bringing your wife for date night, this indoor and outdoor sports bar is comfortable and delicious.
My burger was great, they gave my SO the wrong order.  Fries were so-so.  Cheesecake was pretty poor quality.  We didn't even finish the slice we shared.  Bathrooms were decent.  Waitress was nice.
A must! Excellent food. Best prices I’ve found on the island for the quantity. Top notch service. 8 days on the island and the only place I’d like to return thus far.

I don't hate The Shack. It's just that this location for some reason don't feel as clean as the Mililani location. Server took a long time. Don't refill our water. Found dirt and bug in our drinks. My husband had grill cheese sandwich and could taste the bread had freezer burns.

Frankly I had never been to a Mainland China before. But this place made me wished why didn't I do that. We had ordered Noodles and Rice, exotic vegetable gravy and spring rolls. Everything tasted really good. Service was excellent. The ambience serves as a really nice place to go for a lunch/dinner with family.

A great place for a team lunch or family outing. They have buffet at reasonable rates every day if the week.  Situated in church landing road it is easily accessible from most of the parts of the city.  The metro exit extends right into the road.  It is a one way and would be better to reach there in an auto or car

The buffet was simply completely off the mark. They had 3 non vegetarian starters, a main course with non vegetarian gravies - you need to have then with veg fried rice or noodles. 

I would have been fine if the starters tasted very good but it was not the case. A fish starter was good but none of the others. Now for the reason for 2 stars Ave not less... Their ice tea was fantastic and all my colleagues agreed their cocktails were nice. Another star because they asked for our feedback and got some prawns that tasted nice.

I suggest you skip the buffet here. Not worthy of 900+ per head.

First time to mainland China.. eye soothing decor, peaceful ambience.. delicious food.. courteous service.. but kept asking feedback for every dish served which kinda bothered.. hence a star less from 5.. overall fine dine experience by leaders..

I had always heard the hype about Mainland China but had not got a chance to try for so many years. So finally couple of weeks back we dropped in here for lunch unplanned. Luckily we got the table without having to wait. 

So we took buffet lunch & starters were served on table. I loved the fish in starters & chicken was also nice. In veg there was potato & corn dishes which was ok. Few beverages were part of buffet & I took lime juice which was very strong lime juice, definitely good when having buffets(for diet conscious !! ) :P Jokes apart !! next took the main course chicken fried rice was authentically Chinese which I had not tasted else where. Also other dishes were authentic Chinese saucy dishes which was tasty & great Chinese food. Dessert section had the mousses, cakes & ice creams which was the usual ones. I was hoping to see some Chinese desserts which would make it a complete Chinese food ! At the end they gave a Chinese tea which was good too!

Ambiance is great & loved the interior decors. Cost for food was worth it.

The food is quite authentic. Ambience is good enough. The staff are courteous and prompt. We stopped by for lunch. Though they had a buffet, we opted for a-la-carte. Our order was served quite late; had to wait almost over 45 minutes. But the staff were apologetic and gave us 2 complimentary dishes. Have to say though the wait was worth it, the mutton was cooked to perfection, the melt-in-mouth kind. The fish was also nicely done; a little heads up about the sweet taste of the gravy would be appreciated. Not everyone is familiar with bong cuisine. All in all it was a good experience.

Are you craving for some authentic Bengali food in a foreign land? Visit Oh! Calcutta. Amazon service, food quality at its best. Perfectly balanced ingredients, not much oily or spicy. If you go in a group, you will surely have a great time there. Ambience is also commendable.

One of the greatest place in Bengaluru to enjoy Bengali cuisine. Location wise perfect and valet parking make life easier when visiting this place.
Price wise on the higher side.

One of the few good bengali restaurants of Bangalore. It is a little pricey, but the food is delicious! They have lunch buffets, but I opted against it. Tried the mustard fish(sorse) which was amazing
Very tasty traditional Bengali food. Mouthwatering recipes. Calcutta Biriyani is awesome. Staffs are well dressed and well behaved, helpful. The ambience is very nice. Had a great experience.

Absolutely third class customer service, the waiters do not even bothers about the customers, the  floor managers do not even give a damn about any customers. They must look what other restaurants are doing these days to enhance their customer service. It was my father's birthday so I called them to book a table for 10 people and decorate the table with flowers and balloons, the manager told me straight away that we can do anything like this, if you want to do all these then bring whatever you want to bring from outside and decorate the table yourself. I felt like falling from the sky after that reply from the manager. 

I wish google had options for negative review, they do not even deserve 1 star review!

The restaurant is located in Tangra locality. Ambiance was good. We ordered Thai chicken soup and drums of heavens for starter and they were very tasty. For the main course we ordered fish and Mixed Cantonese chow. Quantity was good and it was approximately Rs.1000 for two of us.

We heard about this restaurant a lot. So we decided to make a trip there. Awesome experience. Both quantity and quality of food is amazing. Restaurant was full but service speed was pretty quick. Recommend this restaurant to all foodies.

One the best and oldest Chinese restaurant in Chinatown. Tried only non-veg options and food was really good. Quantity was fine. Ambience was nice but could have been better I feel. Service was a little slow. But overall, I'd say a good place for authentic Chinese food in the city.

Since most of the time, having fun at China Town means having delicious foods and beverages at Beijing ( it's a natural instinct to think like this way) , therefore it is very much important to keep its standard high as always....however after long time visit at Beijing, I found below bullet's can be looked upon to stay relevant...

1. Choice of Starters included veg + non veg items need to added in menu 
2. Quality and quantity need to be considered as per standard practice 
3. Some extra items in menu can be added...which can added some extra cuisine like Pork, Lamb, Duck items.
4. Service personnel need to be more prompt and effective towards their services...

It's a simple suggestion/ advice since we expect good service level commitment which now a days are missing compare to old days of " Beijing- China Town"

A great pleasure to be here in Golden Joy Restaurant. Well, it's a place where you can experience nice ambience, well decorations, very good staffs, tasty foods with various kind of drinking options. It's a family restaurant and meant for its delicious foods. Separate smoking zone is available here. Parking lot is also available.

Excellent Chinese! Worst Service!

One of the best Chinese restaurant in Tangra.  A bit crowded in weekend .. food is very good .. value for money! 

Worst service !! If you are with a team you are lucky. Otherwise waiters seldom visit your table .  3% service charge will be automatically added in every bill, but it is written optional .. funny!!

It is one of the best places to go with your family, partner, friends and literally anyone who is into Chinese food, the Hakka style. It serves alcoholic beverages and the ambience is very welcoming too. It is very spacious - a huge USP for them. I am a fan of the thread chicken, dragon fish, the fried rice and the condiments they serve with the food. 😃

Golden Joy restaurant is one of the best pocket friendly places to eat Chinese dishes. It is situated at the core of China Town area, and as expected the taste and quality of the food items didn't disappoint me at all. We ordered Golden Joy special soup along with some chicken and fish starter items, and every thing was prepared with utmost quality and finesse.

Great food menu.
Awesome ambience.
Service little shaky.
Need to wait patiently.
Won't disappoint.
Must have 'Golden Fried Praws'

Food: okey, not too good not too bad
Alcohol: good stock
Interior: needs rennovation
Ambience: less crowded than the usuals
Service: fine. The waiters were polite
Parking: big space
Whioe drinking be sure to know whatz you are drinking
While checking the bill make sure nothing extra is charged
So nice place 4r food enjoy with family good service
Good Chinese restaurant.  Good ambience.  Food is also good.
Place is great to hang out especially with family, nice cozy atmosphere good behaviour of staff price is reasonable
Great experience! Food was delicious! Cosy atmosphere.❤

Our regular hotel when staying in Bangkok, it has rarely disappointed us through our 10+ stays.
Staff is polite and service minded, front desk is usually quick and rooms are nice and, compared to many European hotels, quite spacious.
Big thanks to Suparp and the rest of the guys that greet us when arriving and help with our luggage. Always polite, smiling and service minded.
Breakfast restaurant is good with a huge variety of food, although I prefer to go outside for the local Bangkok taste!

The location is wonderful, right in the city center. Service is good, the staffs are quite helpful. Nice and clean, although a bit small.

Restaurants available everywhere and close to multiple malls like Siam center, Siam Paragon, MBK. The shopping mega Platinum is also just one station away, or if you don't mind the walk, there's a free walkway that takes you nearby as well.

فندق جميل وعجيب من الخدمه الي السكن في الغراف. وحتي الموظفين محترمين وطيبين وحتي الفندق قريب من المول سيام بركون 
Nice hotel! Great, convenient location. The check in staff were really friendly and helpful. I arrived early but Pump managed to find a room with no fuss and no waiting. Thank you!!
Great staff and service.  Good breakfast with variety. Close to everything.  Would stay here again.  Has a pool and a small gym.  Add pa as well.

This hotel wasn't really that nice. The only upside was its location within walking distance of shopping malls, restaurants, street sellers and markets, massages and salons. Personally won't go back as I didn't feel that comfortable there. Made use of the spa for a for massage which was pretty good.

The museum is a vast one housing many different types of relics. It would take you an entire day to explore the museum if you are into getting to know the details of almost every relic present there.

There is also a 4000 years old Egyptian mummy preserved in a glass case.

They have an adequate number of benches at every floor for you to rest your legs from walking around in the museum.

You can visit the museum many times and I am sure you will discover new things each time you go there.

Huge collection that might take entire day if you really keen. But staff here not helpful and no guide for available. Cloak room is there but don't keep valuable items. Clean restroom. 2 stories that can be assessed by wheelchair too but no lift. There is a 4000yr old mummy from Egypt.  And geology section is vast. Especially good for kids to learn Biology. They close it at 4.30 sharp

It's a really nice museum with lot of interesting n informative things to keep u interested. The building is of British- India architecture. Cool experience n suitable for all age groups. Many tourists visit this museum with some saying it to be one of the best in India. Entry ticket/fee is Rs. 50 for adults n 20 for below 18 yrs. No fee for 3yrs or less. I especially loved the mummy.

It's considered as a largest and oldest museum in INDIA.
It has many galleries to display art, zoology, Geology, Economic etc.

It's a 2 story rectangular shaped building in which the middle space is kept empty for Lawn.

I almost spend 3 hours here. If you will check each item one by one then  one day won't even enough for you.

Recently that is from march 1st 2019 they increase the entry fee.

Now entry fee is  ₹50 For adult. And ₹20 for kids above 5.
Camera charges 
₹50 for mobile phones only for photo not video.
₹100 for camera only for photo not video.
₹2000 for small video camera
₹5000 camera with stand.

Parking facility is available by a 3rd party it's under the flyover bridge and it's very expensive like ₹20 for each hour for bike (we end up with paying ₹60 for less than 3 hours).

Tips:
Lift facility is not there so you have to prepare for it.
Free Cold Water is available in the ground floor.

This place is located in a pristine location, but there is no air conditioning. Moreover the price has been revised from 20 to ₹50. But the print still says 20. Don't know what is going on. These days they remain open on weekends till 8pm. The display is not anything great to look. The collection is at par with other museums in the country. There is a dinosaur and mamoth and a blue whale skeleton. Also a mummy is there which are most of the key attraction points.
A Historical Traction which is worth a visit you'll experience the ancient traditional structure and more of being at peace.
It was awesome... U can offer here namaz and take some time to chill..
One of the oldest mosques in Kolkata, it is also one most vital ones in the city. Situated at famed Chowringhee crossing, it is a very busy  one and seat of one of the most vital Imams.

Today I attended the 1:30 show (English). The presentation was nice but the presenter told that the age of Universe is 16.8 Billion years, which as far as my knowledge goes (and I believe most of world's ) is 3 billion years older than the present estimate of ~13.8 Billion years. When I asked her after the presentation about this, she confidently said that 16.8 is the correct number and asked me to check it up. She mentioned that she works there, perhaps alluding that must mean her information must be credible. I am a working scientist and extremely eager to know the source of this breakthrough, which I am not aware of. If I turn out to be right, perhaps I would say I did not like the unfortunate attitude to deny the misinformation coming from a science educator. I also missed the old charms of Calcutta skyline and diminishing moon overhead. Instead heard a cheap, restaurant-like saxophone music before the show starts. I must confess, this itself is a kind of deal-breaker for me and  I sincerely missed the old ambiance. The graphics was new and fantastic. But I felt that this revamped experience traded some old charms for some new better graphics.  Overall, the experience is OK!

Inside the planetarium it is fully air- conditioned and it will be nice for you to grab the back seats as it is more easy to view everything from there and there is also no seat number on the tickets. So, you can take with you food and drinks, but it's my advice to carry them earlier as there is not much shops there and exorbitant charges are taken sometimes. Once the show starts, you can see that on the top of the planetarium. Good for kids as well as grown ups. Must visit the place once for a try. Lovely place.

The Calcutta Police Museum is a little museum dedicated entirely to the historical activities of Police - pre and post British era! There is no need for fees or registration to gain access inside. The only thing you need to do is to fill up some initials on the attendance register at the entrance and to keep your baggage outside on a table-top. There are about 5 rooms showcasing all the items of historical importance. Most of the items are concealed within glass cases and the incidents related to it are vividly described. The items at display especially the guns and sharp instruments are worth having a look. There's a suit kept at display used by personnel for diffusing bombs. I found it quite interesting. There are several rock carved idols confiscated by the department from illegal trading which are absolutely delightful to watch. 

Please make a note that: PHOTOGRAPHY IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED. 

Do not make any attempt to take any sort of photographs.

Many historical things used by freedom fighters... 
Old  guns bombs swords knives. evolution of police system.

If You want to know the history of police department,you must come here. Here you can see different type of antique firearms, grenade,bullet making instrument which were used by freedom fighters and police personnels.If you watch everything thoroughly,it will take 1-1.30 hour to visit the place. Inside photography is strictly prohibited.
It's a good place. Many interesting history can be seen here. Different types of guns, medals,their value, bombs, etc,that means a very rare collections can be seen here!  Go for it at free of cost!

A great place to upgrade knowledge on the police department from the start. Good amount of valuable and interesting information available.

2. You cannot carry any bag along with you inside.

When you hear about a famous restaurant and go there, the first and foremost thing you assume is the food should be upto the mark. And I can totally assure everyone that whatever you order from their menu, it will be worth remembering. The food is delicious as well as of good quality. In short, if you have only one day to spend in the City of Joy, this place is one of the best destinations in older parts of the city to fill your palate with evening snacks or dinner 🔥

Loved it! It was a pretty quiet place. The food was good. Had Shanghai Noodles and vegetable side dish with chili garlic sauce. Crispy Mushroom  could have been little better. Overall very good. 4 stars from me. Looking forward to visit again.

We have been informed by a local that this place has lost its charm. Still we have come here today. But i must tell u, its food is authentic, quantity wise n quality wise both.
Nice decor, staff r helpful....
We have ordered mix pan fried noodles with gravy, vegetable fried rice, honey chicken n pork garlic. Pricing is totally right.

Too bad food quality... and hospitality is also bad.. donot go there for having food.. when i complin for food quality thir maneger told me that when they have huge custome in thoes time they compromise with thir food quality..so i suggeat that dont go there for having food..its westage of money..
Quality of food is great. Service needs to be improved.

Good restaurant. Interior good. Price reasonable. All sorts of items available. The disadvantage is its location. Situated at a small street. Waiters polite. But not suitable for party. Mainly 4 seater table. AC not. There is cooler. Overall good at achievable price. I ordered devil chicken fried rice momo. They were very good. Amount is decent.
It's great. Maintains quality all through. Beautiful salesmanship. By 8PM almost everything is sold out!
Fantastic sweets. Had modhuporko and Roshogollah  there. Amazing taste and texture. A must visit place.

One of the best shops for  Rasogolla. In terms of taste it is close to Vien. But my preferred Rasogolla destination is Mithai. Madhuparko is the much hyped sweet dish of Chittaranjan Mistanna Bhandar. I didn't like it's taste. However this shop pays attention to cleanliness. It is really praiseworthy.
Awesome rossogolla and sandesh..speciality being modhuporko..a creamy pudding
It's great.. Specially the rosogolla and chanar sondesh..

All the people in and around the temple are grave robbers. You have to be at their mercy right from the point you try to enter the temple. Anyone can call themselves lucky if they spend anything less than 500 rupees at each turn!

Kalighat temple by itself is a marvellous temple with the idol of Kalimata in its beautiful splendour and powerful energy. The problem are the pundits and other temple staff who can make your purses lighter for no reason. So be aware when you go and visit this temple..

absolutely avoid the pundits and the weekends.

One most revered temples of Goddess Kali, must visit for anyone visiting Kolkata. Google does not show precise location. It shows main road, from where you have to walk about 15 minutes. Temple needs to be maintained better and flow of devotees needs to be managed better.
Needs better crows management. Cleanliness is a concern. The behaviour of the persons in charge of the deity is not appropriate of the post they held.

Temples are places where you go to achieve inner peace and experience devotion... The temple is not well maintained.. The temple staff are unable to control large crowds; pushing and shoving go hand in hand... Volunteers at the' Special Darshan' forcefully demanded money... Their conduct was reproachable and extremely annoying

One of the best galleries (from artists representation perspective) in Kolkata but unfortunately not a professional gallery. I have been to galleries across the world and wish this place was better managed.
It was a nice experience to see the beautiful paintings drawn by various artists specially the painting drawn by Pavan Kavitkar

Most reputed art gallery of Kolkata that regularly hold shows/ exhibitions of eminent as well as young artists. The gallery organises an art competition and an annual summer show. Other important events are Art i Life of -a show od saris, scarves, ornaments artecrafts and Art mela- a fair of affordable paintings and sculpture.
Peaceful, thoughtfully-curated space. Quality pieces on the wall. Revolving exhibits
Good workplace. On the main  road. Transportation easily available.

I have heard that lotus grows in mud but I have seen it here. Mother Teresa has made this home for the poor and destitute. It is located beside the Kalighat temple. There is parking facility beside the home. The entire area is full of beggars and poor people. Nirmal Hriday home smells, is dirty and you may feel uneasy but there are volunteers to take care of the patient. #letsguide

Nirmal Hriday Mother Teresa's Home for the Dying Destitutes, it is situated in Kalighat, beside the Kalighat temple.

I have visited this place today. Today 31st December, 2018 is the another best day in my life. We four friends distributed some food for the home members ( approx 100 members ). The employees are very good behaviour.

I spent my last morning in India volunteering in this home. It was an eye-opening and humbling experience. I was surprised at the large number of foreign volunteers that were gathered at Mother House before my group took a local bus here together. They come from all over the world and some of them have been here for months. I spoke to a chinese guy who quit his job just to come India and volunteer for 3 months.. and he’s not even a catholic! A worthy testimony of how Mother Teresa’s universal love have come to influence people all around the globe.

The nuns I spoke to were all kind and gentle people. Personally, I felt that the organization of work duties had room for improvement, but the initiative to open up volunteering stints for as short a duration as a few hours is brilliant. It gives people like me a chance to help out physically as well as be uplifted mentally. Believe it or not, this giving experience definitely go both ways!
It really makes you humble and helps you appreciate what you have rather than thinking of what you don't have.

Humbling and inspiring
Absolutely loved the atmosphere of the place, the kindness and devotion of the people, and the beautiful prayer ceremony with which my visit coincided. 
I was lucky to witness the singing and the sermons, within the few minutes that I was there for, due to my big checklist and limited time in the city.
Seeing Mother Teresa's room oddly gave me nervous goosebumps. All the people of the place seemed so full of faith and reverence it was almost overwhelming. 
Met people from at least seven different countries from Europe, Northern Asia and Africa all there to try and absorb the history of the place.
There was a lady outside, in large spectacles, who spoke pleasant English, and asked money for her "handicapped son". I almost believed her until her friend spoke in Bengali, tauntingly with a contradictory tone to what she said. She said "the girl doesn't look as stupid as she is". They didn't know I could understand Bengali.
I'm a medical student in Bangladesh since Jan 2016. I understand well enough.
I just quietly walked away as they shouted after me.

It is the best institute for learning language. They charge very nominal fees for Spoken English course . It is 20 months course. One have to pay 1200 rs in every 4 months which is very inexpensive. 2019 session will begin from May and the form fill up will start from 25 th March. U can contact to the office.

This centre, established in 1938 elsewhere and shifted finally to its present premises in 1961, has a threefold aim: (a) Proper interpretation and appraisal of Indian culture, (b) Promotion of mutual understanding between India and other countries, and (c) Promotion of the study of the cultural heritage of India and of humankind as a whole.

From a modest beginning, the Institute has now grown into a centre of learning and research, recognized by the Universities of Calcutta, Burdwan and Jadavpur. It has drawn the interest of the public as well as many leading scholars of India and other countries.

One of the very disciplined places in the city. Every evening a cultural programme mostly spiritual is conducted.  There are books on sale in addition to a library.  Centrally located and accessible by public transport.

This is the best place I have been ever seen

Amazing food, any dish tastes superb, awesome hospitality. One of the best restaurant for Chinese lovers. Good place to hangout for family friends & couples .... loved it

It's a great place to enjoy Chinese food.. both veg and non veg. It's there for over a decade serving great taste. It's not very expensive but taste is equal to any expensive place. Good ambience, very courteous staff, fast service... Overall it's a great experience. They have valet parking as well.

It is located at Phari crossing, can easily be seen. It offers variety of foods, I ordered chicken roll and it was quite big in size and was filled with chicken so happy about that but it's definitely not pocket friendly. The staffs are well behaved,place is good,maintains hygiene.

Now it is known as Ballygunge Dhaba. Their Vegetables items are better than Non-veg items. They're open only from afternoon. Ptice is moderate.

I liked the place. Its busy and has decent management. Good food and servings. You can taste the authenticity of bengali cuisine at a reasonable price. Call in Reservation is must have  on busy days and holidays. After noon buffets and night time dine-in at night. 
I'll get back if time permits.

A great place for authentic Bengali cuisine. The makers of this place have put in great effort and it shows. The decor is really beautiful, the menu describes the local cuisines very well and service is right mix attention without interrupting your conversations.

5 star for food and service. Highly appreciate their attitude and hospitality. Visited this outlet on a weekday which is in my locality in saltlake

Overall its a gem in our locality in around cc1 Hope to visit soon again.
This is perhaps the best Bengali food place that we have in SaltLake. Each and every dish is excellent. Must visit if you are in town

The food is great in quality and really tasty. Anyone who loves Bengali food will come back to this place for more. The only drawback for me was that the meat served here is halal. Had one of the best Chinese food experience here. Amazing location to have lunch/dinner with your colleagues or friends. Do try their soups/rice noodles. Awesome food !!

The chili pork special is very good here. It's a very old restaurant cum bar, probably among the first in Kolkata in that area. A nice and cosy place. Some Tables have partition so nice for group privacy. Chinese food is extremely tasty. It tastes very refined. The staff are courteous and the drinks menu is extensive. On the scale of 1 to 5 value for money I would give it 4 stars.

I visited Jimmy's Kitchen after 25 years and went with high expectations from my earlier visits. While the decor has remained the same and the service was still good the food itself was disappointing. It seems to have lost the authentic Chinese flavour it is famous for.

The Chilli chicken didn't feel fresh and tasted rather plain too. Didn't feel like ordering anything after that. Alcohol was overpriced considering the sub-par ambience. No cocktails were available even though listed on the menu. And the only ice cream being served was vanilla, again other flavors were on the list though not being served.
The dry chilly chicken is awesome! Limited option on cocktails. Drinks are pretty cheap. Nice place to hang out for drinks...

If one is interested in Mughlai dishes, this is a fabulous joint for your taste buds. Do give it a try with your family and friends. Rates are reasonable with AC facility a wide variety of food choice and restaurant guys are friendly.
The food is good. But the space is very cozy. Staffs behaviour is good too.
Food seems more tastier than before. The staff behaviour was excellent. Had mutton biryani and chicken dishes, just fantastic
